Headline: Software Engineer at DataScouting & Chair of IEEE IHU Serres
Summary: My name is Iordanis Kostelidis, and I am from Thessaloniki, Greece. Currently, I am pursuing BEng in Computer, Informatics, and Telecommunications Engineering at International Hellenic University. I work as a Software Engineer in the company DataScouting. I am a Student Member of IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers), and I am Past-Chair of the IEEE IHU Student Branch in Serres Campus. In addition, I am a Mentor in the HERMES Team (Student Team of IHU and UTh).
